alert.note: Alert for Delaware (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 02 at 1:53AM CST until January 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 28 below zero. Snow has ended across the area. Some blowing snow is possible through the overnight. * WHERE...Delaware County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
